Text: A documentary swarm is one of the terms used for the technique of creating audio/video media content that combines documentary film, and citizen journalism.

Triplets:<documentary swarm
1:
--------------------
Text: Documentary swarm:  The concept was first utilized by Martin Kunert and Eric Manes's 2004 theatrical film "Voices of Iraq" where 150 DV cameras were sent to Iraq during the war and used by Iraqis to film themselves.

Triplets:<Martin Kunert
